QueryDataSource.Name: dtSource
QueryDataSource.Sql: --出院患者 select distinct 'PDY97822944010613A5182' AS P900, --1 医疗机构代码 '广州爱博恩妇产医院' AS P6891,--2 机构名称 '' AS P686 ,--3 医疗保险手册（卡）号 '' AS P800,--4 健康卡号 decode(fi.pact_code,'1','7','2','5','3','7','5','7','4','1','6','1') AS P1, --5 医疗付款方式 p.ftimes AS P2, --6 就诊次数 p.fprn AS P3, --7 病案号 p.fname AS P4,--8 姓名 p.fsexbh AS P5,--9 性别 p.fbirthday AS P6,--10 出生日期 trunc((fi.in_date-fi.birthday)/365,0) AS P7,--11 年龄 substr(p.fstatusbh,1,1) AS P8,--12 婚姻状况 '' AS P9,--13 职业 '' AS P101,--14 出生省份 '' AS P102,--15 出生地市 '' AS P103,--16 出生地县 p.fnationality AS P11,--17 民族 p.fcountry AS P12,--18 国籍 nvl(replace(replace(fi.idenno,'-',''),'.',''),'NA') AS P13, --19 证件号码 fi.home AS P801, --20 现住址 '' AS P802, --21 住宅电话 '' AS P803, --22 现住址邮政编码 p.fdwaddr AS P14, --23 工作单位及地址 p.fdwtele AS P15, --24 电话 p.fdwpost AS P16, --25 工作单位邮政编码 p.fhkaddr AS P17, --26 户口地址 p.fhkpost AS P171, --27 户口所在地邮政编码 p.flxname AS P18, --28 联系人姓名 (select nvl(d.lgcode,'8') from database d where d.code='RC033' and p.frelate=d.lgname ) AS P19, --29 关系 p.fdwtele AS P20, --30 联系人地址 decode(p.frytjbh,'9','4',p.frytjbh) AS P804, --31 入院途径 p.fhkaddr AS P21, --32 联系人电话 p.frydate AS P22, --33 入院日期 (select d.lgcode from database d where d.code='RC023' and fi.dept_code=d.hiscode ) AS P23, --34 入院科别 p.frybs AS P231, --35 入院病室 '' AS P24, --36 转科科别 p.fcydate AS P25, --37 出院日期 (select d.lgcode from database d where d.code='RC023' and fi.dept_code=d.hiscode ) AS P26, --38 出院科别 p.fdays AS P27, --40 实际住院天数 p.fmzzdbh AS P28, --41 门（急）诊诊断编码 p.fmzzd AS P281, --42 门（急）诊诊断描述 '' AS P29, --43 入院时情况 replace(a.入院主要诊断编码,'--','') AS P30, --44 入院诊断编码 replace(a.入院主要诊断描述,'--','') AS P301, --45 入院诊断描述 to_char(p.frydate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS P31, --46 入院后确诊日期 replace(a.入院主要诊断编码,'--','') AS P321, --47 主要诊断编码 replace(a.入院主要诊断描述,'--','') AS P322, --48 主要诊断疾病描述 '' AS P805, --49 主要针对入院病情 '' AS P323, --50 主要诊断出院情况 '' AS P324, --51 其他诊断编码1 '' AS P325, --52 其他诊断疾病描述1 '' AS P806, --53 其他诊断入院病情1 '' AS P326, --54 其他诊断出院病情1 '' AS P327, --55 其他诊断编码2 '' AS P328, --56 其他诊断疾病描述2 '' AS P807, --57 其他诊断入院病情2 '' AS P329, --58 其他诊断出院病情2 '' AS P3291, --59 其他诊断编码3 '' AS P3292, --60 其他诊断疾病描述3 '' AS P808, --61 其他诊断入院病情3 '' AS P3293, --62 其他诊断出院病情3 '' AS P3294, --63 其他诊断编码4 '' AS P3295, --64 其他诊断疾病描述4 '' AS P809, --65 其他诊断入院病情4 '' AS P3296, --66 其他诊断出院病情4 '' AS P3297, --67 其他诊断编码5 '' AS P3298, --68 其他诊断疾病描述5 '' AS P810, --69 其他诊断入院病情5 '' AS P3299, --70 其他诊断出院病情5 '' AS P3281, --71 其他诊断编码6 '' AS P3282, --72 其他诊断疾病描述6 '' AS P811, --73 其他诊断入院病情6 '' AS P3283, --74 其他诊断出院病情6 '' AS P3284, --75 其他诊断编码7 '' AS P3285, --76 其他诊断疾病描述7 '' AS P812, --77 其他诊断入院病情7 '' AS P3286, --78 其他诊断出院病情7 '' AS P3287, --79 其他诊断编码8 '' AS P3288, --80 其他诊断疾病描述8 '' AS P813, --81 其他诊断入院病情8 '' AS P3289, --82 其他诊断出院病情8 '' AS P3271, --83 其他诊断编码9 '' AS P3272, --84 其他诊断疾病描述9 '' AS P814, --85 其他诊断入院病情9 '' AS P3273, --86 其他诊断出院病情9 '' AS P3274, --87 其他诊断编码10 '' AS P3275, --88 其他诊断疾病描述10 '' AS P815, --89 其他诊断入院病情10 '' AS P3276, --90 其他诊断出院病情10 '' AS P689, --91 医院感染总次数 '' AS P351, --92 病理诊断编码1 '' AS P352, --93 病理诊断名称1 '' AS P816, --94 病理号1 '' AS P353, --95 病理诊断编码2 '' AS P354, --96 病理诊断名称2 '' AS P817, --97 病理号2 '' AS P355, --98 病理诊断编码3 '' AS P356, --99 病理诊断名称3 '' AS P818, --100 病理号 '' AS P361, --101 损伤、中毒的外部因素编码1 '' AS P362, --102 损伤、中毒的外部因素名称1 '' AS P363, --103 损伤、中毒的外部因素编码2 '' AS P364, --104 损伤、中毒的外部因素名称2 '' AS P365, --105 损伤、中毒的外部因素编码3 '' AS P366, --106 损伤、中毒的外部因素名称3 '' AS P371, --107 过敏源 p.fgmyw AS P372, --108 过敏药物名称 '' AS P38, --109 HBsAg '' AS P39, --110 HCV-Ab '' AS P40, --111 HIV-Ab '' AS P411, --112 门诊与出院诊断符合情况 p.frycyaccobh AS P412, --113 入院与出院诊断符合情况 '' AS P413, --114 术前与术后诊断符合情况 p.flcblaccobh AS P414, --115 临床与病理诊断符合情况 '' AS P415, --116 放射与病理诊断符合情况 p.fqjtimes AS P421, --117 抢救次数 p.fqjsuctimes AS P422, --118 抢救成功次数 '' AS P687, --119 最高诊断依据 '' AS P688, --120 分化程度 p.fkzr AS P431, --121 科主任 p.fzrdoctor AS P432, --122 主(副主)任医师 p.fzzdoct AS P433, --123 主治医师 p.fzydoct AS P434, --124 住院医师 p.fnurse AS P819, --125 责任护士 p.fjxdoct AS P435, --126 进修医师 '' AS P436, --127 研究生实习医师 p.fsxdoct AS P437, --128 实习医师 p.fbmy AS P438, --129 编码员 p.fqualitybh AS P44, --130 病案质量 p.fzkdoct AS P45, --131 质控医师 p.fzknurse AS P46, --132 质控护师 p.fzkrq AS P47, --133 质控日期 (select o.fopcode from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='1') AS P490, --134 手术操作编码1 (select o.fopdate from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='1') AS P491, --135 手术操作日期 (select o.fssjbbh from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='1') AS P820, --136 手术级别1 (select o.fop from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='1') AS P492, --137 手术操作名称1 '' AS P493, --138 手术操作部位1 '' AS P494, --139 手术持续时间1 (select o.fdocname from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='1') AS P495, --140 术者1 (select o.fopdoct1 from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='1') AS P496, --141 Ⅰ助1 (select o.fopdoct2 from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='1') AS P497, --142 Ⅱ助1 (select d.lgcode from tOperation o,database d where d.code='RC013' and o.fmazuibh=d.hiscode and o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='1') AS P498, --143 麻醉方式1 (select o.fssjbbh from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='1') AS P4981, --144 麻醉分级1 (select decode(o.fqiekoubh,0,0,d.lgcode) end from tOperation o,database d where d.code='RC014'and (o.fqiekoubh||o.fyuhebh)=d.hiscode and o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='1' ) AS P499, --145 切口愈合等级1 (select o.fmzdoct from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='1') AS P4910, --146 麻醉医师1 (select o.fopcode from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='2') AS P4911, --147 手术操作编码2 (select o.fopdate from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='2') AS P4912, --148 手术操作日期2 (select o.fssjbbh from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='2') AS P821, --149 手术级别2 (select o.fop from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='2') AS P4913, --150 手术操作名称2 '' AS P4914, --151 手术操作部位2 '' AS P4915, --152 手术持续时间2 (select o.fdocname from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='2') AS P4916, --153 术者2 (select o.fopdoct1 from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='2') AS P4917, --154Ⅰ助2 (select o.fopdoct2 from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='2') AS P4918, --155 Ⅱ助2 (select d.lgcode from tOperation o,database d where d.code='RC013' and o.fmazuibh=d.hiscode and o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='2') AS P4919, --156 麻醉方式2 (select o.fssjbbh from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='2') AS P4982, --157 麻醉分级2 (select decode(o.fqiekoubh,0,0,d.lgcode) end from tOperation o,database d where d.code='RC014'and (o.fqiekoubh||o.fyuhebh)=d.hiscode and o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='2' ) AS P4920, --158 切口愈合等级2 (select o.fmzdoct from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='2') AS P4921, --159 麻醉医师2 (select o.fopcode from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='3') AS P4922, --160 手术操作编码3 (select o.fopdate from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='3') AS P4923, --161 手术操作日期3 (select o.fssjbbh from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='3') AS P822, --162 手术级别3 (select o.fop from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='3') AS P4924, --163 手术操作名称3 '' AS P4925, --164 手术操作部位3 '' AS P4526, --165 手术持续时间3 (select o.fdocname from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='3') AS P4527, --166 术者3 (select o.fopdoct1 from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='3') AS P4528, --167Ⅰ助3 (select o.fopdoct2 from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='3') AS P4529, --168 Ⅱ助3 (select d.lgcode from tOperation o,database d where d.code='RC013' and o.fmazuibh=d.hiscode and o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='3') AS P4530, --169 麻醉方式3 (select o.fssjbbh from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='3') AS P4983, --170 麻醉分级3 (select decode(o.fqiekoubh,0,0,d.lgcode) end from tOperation o,database d where d.code='RC014'and (o.fqiekoubh||o.fyuhebh)=d.hiscode and o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='3' ) AS P4531, --171 切口愈合等级3 (select o.fmzdoct from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='3') AS P4532, --172 麻醉医师3 (select o.fopcode from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='4') AS P4533, --173 手术操作编码4 (select o.fopdate from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='4') AS P4534, --174 手术操作日期4 (select o.fssjbbh from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='4') AS P823, --175 手术级别4 (select o.fop from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='4') AS P4535, --176 手术操作名称4 '' AS P4536, --177 手术操作部位4 '' AS P4537, --178 手术持续时间4 (select o.fdocname from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='4') AS P4538, --179 术者4 (select o.fopdoct1 from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='4') AS P4539, --180Ⅰ助4 (select o.fopdoct2 from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='4') AS P4540, --181 Ⅱ助4 tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='4') AS P4984, --183 麻醉分级4 (select decode(o.fqiekoubh,0,0,d.lgcode) end from tOperation o,database d where d.code='RC014'and (o.fqiekoubh||o.fyuhebh)=d.hiscode and o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='4' ) AS P4542, --184 切口愈合等级4 (select o.fmzdoct from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='4') AS P4543, --185 麻醉医师4 (select o.fopcode from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='5') AS P4544, --186 手术操作编码5 (select o.fopdate from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='5') AS P4545, --187 手术操作日期5 (select o.fssjbbh from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='5') AS P824, --188 from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='5') AS P4549, --192 术者5 (select o.fopdoct1 from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='5') AS P4550, --193Ⅰ助5 (select o.fopdoct2 from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='5') AS P4551, --194 Ⅱ助5 (select d.lgcode from tOperation o,database d where d.code='RC013' and o.fmazuibh=d.hiscode and o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='5') AS P4552, --195 麻醉方式5 (select o.fssjbbh from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='5') AS P4985, --196 麻醉分级5 (select decode(o.fqiekoubh,0,0,d.lgcode) end from tOperation o,database d where d.code='RC014'and (o.fqiekoubh||o.fyuhebh)=d.hiscode and o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='7') AS p45021, --220 Ⅱ助7 (select d.lgcode from tOperation o,database d where d.code='RC013' and o.fmazuibh=d.hiscode and o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and end from tOperation o,database d where d.code='RC014'and (o.fqiekoubh||o.fyuhebh)=d.hiscode and o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='7' ) AS p45024, --223 切口愈合等级7 (select o.fmzdoct from and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='8') AS P827, --227 手术级别8 (select o.fop from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='8') AS p45028, --228 手术操作名称8 '' AS p45029, o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='9') AS p45039, --239 手术操作日期9 (select o.fssjbbh from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='9') AS P828, and o.fmazuibh=d.hiscode and o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and o.foptimes='10') AS p45058, --260 麻醉方式10 (select o.fssjbbh from tOperation o where o.fprn=p.fprn and o.ftimes=p.ftimes and --264 特级护理天数 '' AS P562, --265 一级护理天数 '' AS P563, --266 二级护理天数 '' AS P564, --267 三级护理天数 '' AS P6911, --268 重症监护室名称1 '' AS P6912, --269 进入时间1 '' AS P6913, --270 退出时间1 '' AS P6914, --271 重症监护室名称2 '' AS P6915, --272 进入时间2 '' AS P6916, --273 退出时间2 '' AS P6917, --274 重症监护室名称3 '' AS P6918, --275 进入时间3 '' AS P6919, --276 退出时间3 '' AS P6920, --277 重症监护室名称4 '' AS P6921, --278 进入时间4 '' AS P6922, --279 退出时间4 '' AS P6923, --280 重症监护室名称5 '' AS P6924, --281 进入时间5 '' AS P6925, --282 退出时间5 '' AS P57, --283 死亡患者尸检 '' AS P58, --284 手术、治疗、检查、诊断为本院第一列 '' AS P581, --285 手术患者类型 '' AS P60, --286 随诊 '' AS P611, --287 随诊周数 '' AS P612, --288 随诊月数 '' AS P613, --289 随诊年数 '' AS P59, --290 示教病例 p.fbloodbh AS P62, --291 ABO血型 p.frhbh AS P63, --292 Rh血型 '' AS P64, --293 输血反应 (select sum(il.qty)*cd.mark tot_sum from fin_ipb_itemlist il inner join com_dictionary cd on cd.type='BLOOD' and il.item_code=cd.code where il.item_name like '%红细胞%' and il.inpatient_no=fi.inpatient_no group by il.inpatient_no,cd.mark) AS P651, --294 红细胞 (select sum(il.qty)*cd.mark tot_sum from fin_ipb_itemlist il inner join com_dictionary cd on cd.type='BLOOD' and il.item_code=cd.code where il.item_name like '%血小板%' and il.inpatient_no=fi.inpatient_no group by il.inpatient_no,cd.mark) AS P652, --295 血小板 (select sum(il.qty)*cd.mark tot_sum from fin_ipb_itemlist il inner join com_dictionary cd on cd.type='BLOOD' and il.item_code=cd.code where il.item_name like '%血浆%' and il.inpatient_no=fi.inpatient_no group by il.inpatient_no,cd.mark) AS P653, --296 血浆 (select sum(il.qty)*cd.mark tot_sum from fin_ipb_itemlist il inner join com_dictionary cd on cd.type='BLOOD' and il.item_code=cd.code where il.item_name like '%全血%' and il.inpatient_no=fi.inpatient_no group by il.inpatient_no,cd.mark) AS P654, --297 全血 0 AS P655, --298 自体回收 0 AS P656, --299 其它 case when to_number((sysdate-p.fbirthday)/4380)>=1 then '' else to_char(trunc((sysdate-p.fbirthday)/4380,2),'fm999990.99') end AS P66, --300 （年龄不足1周岁的）年龄 p.fcstz AS P681, --301 新生儿出生体重1 '' AS P682, --302 新生儿出生体重2 '' AS P683, --303 新生儿出生体重3 '' AS P684, --304 新生儿出生体重4 '' AS P685, --305 新生儿出生体重5 p.frytz AS P67, --306 新生儿入院体重 p.fryqhmhours AS P731, --307 入院前多少小时(颅脑损伤患者昏迷时间) p.fryqhmmins AS P732, --308 入院前多少分钟(颅脑损伤患者昏迷时间) p.fryhmhours AS P733, --309 入院后多少小时(颅脑损伤患者昏迷时间) p.fryhmmins AS P734, --310 入院后多少分钟(颅脑损伤患者昏迷时间) '' AS P72, --311 呼吸机使用时间 p.fisagainrybh AS P830, --312 是否有出院31天再住院计划目的 substr(p.fisagainrymd,1,200) AS P831, --313 出院31天再计划入院目的 p.flyfsbh AS P741, --314 离院方式 p.fyzouthostital AS P742, --315 转入医院名称 p.fsqouthostital AS P743, --316 转入社区服务机构/乡镇卫生院名称 round(p.fsum1,2) AS P782, --317 住院总费用 round(p.fzfje,2) AS P751, --318 住院总费用其中自付金额 round(p.fzhfwlylf,2) AS P752, --319 一般医疗服务费 round(p.fzhfwlczf,2) AS P754, --320 一般治疗操作费 round(p.fzhfwlhlf,2) AS P755, --321 护理费 round(p.fzhfwlqtf,2) AS P756, --322 综合医疗服务类其他费用 round(p.fzdlblf,2) AS P757, --323 病理诊断费 round(p.fzdlsssf,2) AS P758, --324 实验室诊断费 round(p.fzdlyxf,2) AS P759, --325 影像学诊断费 round(p.fzdllcf,2) AS P760, --326 临床诊断项目费 round(p.fzllffssf,2) AS P761, --327 非手术治疗项目费 round(p.fzllfwlzwlf,2) AS P762, --328 临床物理治疗费 round(p.fzllfssf,2) AS P763, --329 手术治疗费 round(p.fzllfmzf,2) AS P764, --330 麻醉费 round(p.fzllfsszlf,2) AS P765, --331 手术费 round(p.fkflkff,2) AS P767, --332 康复费 round(p.fzylzf,2) AS P768, --333 中医治疗费 round(p.fxyf,2) AS P769, --334 西药费 round(p.fxylgjf,2) AS P770, --335 抗菌药物费用 round(p.fzchyf,2) AS P771, --336 中成药费 round(p.fzcyf,2) AS P772, --337 中草药费 round(p.fxylxf,2) AS P773, --338 血费 round(p.fxylbqbf,2) AS P774, --339 白蛋白类制品费 round(p.fxylqdbf,2) AS P775, --340 球蛋白类制品费 round(p.fxylyxyzf,2) AS P776, --341 凝血因子类制品费 round(p.fxylxbyzf,2) AS P777, --342 细胞因子类制品费 round(p.fhclcjf,2) AS P778, --343 检查用一次性医用材料费 round(p.fhclzlf,2) AS P779, --344 治疗用一次性医用材料费 round(p.fhclssf,2) AS P780, --345 手术用一次性医用材料费 round(p.fqtf,2) AS P781 --346 其他费 from tPatientVisit@bagldblink p left join fin_ipr_inmaininfo fi on /*fi.inpatient_no=p.fzyid*/fi.patient_no='00'||substr(p.fprn,1,8) and p.ftimes=fi.in_times left join lgsb@emr1_dblink a on a.his内部标识=fi.inpatient_no left join (select row_number() over(partition by m.inpatient_no order by m.date_bgn) id, m.inpatient_no,m.item_name,sum(m.dose_once) tot_qty,m.mark4 qty,m.mark5 dose_unit,m.date_bgn,m.date_end,cd.input_code from met_ipm_order m left join fin_ipb_medicinelist ml on m.inpatient_no=ml.inpatient_no and m.item_code=ml.drug_code and m.mo_order=ml.mo_order left join fin_ipr_inmaininfo fi on m.inpatient_no=fi.inpatient_no left join com_dictionary cd on cd.type='frequency' and m.frequency_code=cd.code where regexp_like(m.item_name,'奥司他韦|达菲|可威|扎那米韦|依乐韦|也青|帕拉米韦|力纬|阿比多尔 |阿比朵尔|壮彤|恩尔欣|玛诺苏|莲花清瘟|金花清感颗粒|金刚烷胺|迪龙|金刚乙胺|仁和|立安|金迪纳|津彤|太之奥| 利巴韦林|锐迪|均达坦|奇力威林|利迈欣|柯萨|南元|利力宁|达畅|威乐星|奥得清|奥佳') and fi.out_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime' ,'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date( '&dtEndTime','yyyy-MM-dd') +1 group by m.inpatient_no,m.item_name,m.mark4 ,m.mark5,m.date_bgn,m.date_end,cd.input_code) d on fi.inpatient_no=d.inpatient_no where (( a.入院主要诊断编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断1编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断2编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断3编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断4编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断5编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断6编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断7编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断8编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断9编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断10编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断11编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断12编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断13编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断14编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断15编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断16编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断17编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断18编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断19编码 like 'J%' or a.入院其他诊断20编码 like 'J%') or ( ((a.入院主要诊断描述 like '%甲%流%' or a.入院主要诊断描述 like '%乙%流%' or a.入院主要诊断描述 like '%流%感%') and ( a.入院主要诊断描述 like '%流感嗜血%' or a.入院主要诊断描述 like '%副流感%' or a.入院主要诊断描述 like '%血流感染%')) or ((a.入院其他诊断描述 like '%甲%流%' or a.入院其他诊断描述 like '%乙%流%' or a.入院其他诊断描述 like '%流%感%') and ( a.入院其他诊断描述 like '%流感嗜血%' or a.入院其他诊断描述 like '%副流感%' or a.入院其他诊断描述 like '%血流感染%')) or ((a.入院其他诊断1描述 like '%甲%流%' or a.入院其他诊断1描述 like '%乙%流%' or a.入院其他诊断1描述 like '%流%感%') and ( a.入院其他诊断1描述 like '%流感嗜血%' or a.入院其他诊断1描述 like '%副流感%' or a.入院其他诊断1描述 like '%血流感染%')) or
